long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension calculates the xp required to get a marble card from a specific initial level to a specific desired level. The marble card logo also acts as a shortcut to take you to the marble.cards website. 

This extension is not made by marble cards officially.
I am just an admirer looking to make everyone's marbling experience just a little more easy.
